Posts.EditableText: Hi guys, how can I delete a game that I uploaded unlisted? I don't see a button.  Thank you,
Posts.HTML: Hi guys, how can I delete a game that I uploaded unlisted? I don't see a button. Thank you,

Posts.EditableText: I think you need to contact a site administrator; there's no way to delete a game yourself once it's published.
Posts.HTML: I think you need to contact a site administrator; there's no way to delete a game yourself once it's published.

Posts.EditableText: You can switch it to private and no one can see it/find it without a given link.
Posts.HTML: You can switch it to private and no one can see it/find it without a given link.
